content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STLoadChild') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLoadChild
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STLoadChild (
    [lms_loadchild_id] bigint,
    [lms_loadchild_routeid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_driverid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_sealno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_vehicleid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_ttypeid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_userid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_ldate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_courierid] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_site] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_fromlocid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_tolocid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_cdate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_trailer1] int,
    [lms_loadchild_trailer2] int,
    [lms_loadchild_cref] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_debriefed] int,
    [lms_loadchild_mrpflag] int,
    [lms_loadchild_mrpcflag] int,
    [lms_loadchild_finalflag] int,
    [lms_loadchild_alidaflag] int,
    [lms_loadchild_puibts] int,
    [lms_loadchild_pucols] int,
    [lms_loadchild_planningref] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_interfacedate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_nosealsret] int,
    [lms_loadchild_excludeopsi] int,
    [lms_loadchild_dccref] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_srouteid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_fuellitres] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_loadchild_outsourcedcrew] int,
    [lms_loadchild_masterloadid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_securitygatedespatched] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_securitygateuserid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_securitygatearrived] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_securitygatearriveduserid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_bayno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_loadchild_costs] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_loadchild_estdeparturedatetime] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_totalweight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_loadchild_ovrignore] int,
    [lms_loadchild_childloadid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_orvcode] int,
    [lms_loadchild_companyid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_editloaddate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_reopeneddate] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_reopeneduserid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_novehicle] int,
    [lms_loadchild_mobilefeedbackreasonid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_direct] int,
    [lms_loadchild_noofpcls] int,
    [lms_loadchild_debriefdt] datetime2(7),
    [lms_loadchild_httpcode] int,
    [lms_loadchild_parentloadid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_mrpobversion] int,
    [lms_loadchild_loadid] int,
    [lms_loadchild_aggweight] float,
    [lms_loadchild_aggchargeweight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_loadchild_aggvolweight] float,
    [lms_loadchild_aggvolumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_loadchild_noparcels] bigint

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/stloadchild.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STLoadChild 
GO
